text: (ai rasool) tum poochho to ki kya main khuda ke siva kisee aur ko paravaradigaar talaash karun haaloki vah tamaam cheezo ka maalik hai aur jo shakhs koee bura kaam karata hai usaka (vabaal) usee par hai aur koee shakhs kisee doosare ke gunaah ka bojh nahin uthaane ka phir tum sabako apane paravaradigaar ke huzoor mein laut kar jaana hai tab tum log jin baaton mein baaham jhagadate the vah sab tumhen bata dega
